p.style: text-align: center; mso-layout-grid-align: none; text-autospace: none;

span.em: "Hartford Central School, a community of educators, students, parents, and friends,

p.style: text-align: center; mso-layout-grid-align: none; text-autospace: none;

span.em: dedicates itself to developing citizens who are productive and compassionate, and who,

p.style: text-align: center; mso-layout-grid-align: none; text-autospace: none;

span.em: through their creativity and responsibility, will be assets to the greater community."
